summary: "Close Encounters of the Third Kind," a 1977 sci-fi film by Steven Spielberg, stars Richard Dreyfuss as Roy Neary, a regular guy whose life changes after seeing a UFO. Also featured is Jillian, a mom whose son was taken by aliens. The movie, made with a $19.4 million budget, was a big hit, earning over $300 million worldwide. It won many awards and is now preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry. Spielberg later released a Special Edition and a Director's Cut, tweaking the ending each time. The film was remastered and re-released for its 40th anniversary in 2017.
title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
